attributes.action: Award of the South Atlantic Medal(Without Rosette) to HMS Ledbury/HMS Brecon/RMS St Helena
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As part of Operation Corporate we were tasked by the MOD and Government to sail for the Falklands as part of the Task Force before the surrender. The ships were involved in hazardous mine clearance operations and I believe were overlooked when the criteria was set for the medal.
In recognition of the dangerous work I kindly ask the Prime Minister to consider awarding the medal(without rosette)or a clasp to the GSM to the 3 ships.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with the MOD.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
